entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
